readme:
# Forro패 cipher

Forro패 is an ARX-based cipher, similar to Salsa and ChaCha, but with faster diffusion.

Ref: [Latin Dances Reloaded: Improved Cryptanalysis Against Salsa and ChaCha, and the Proposal of Forr칩](https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-031-22963-3_9)

This is an implementation for Zig.
